description: Composite integers m such that P(m)^2 == 1 (mod m), where P(m) is the m-th Pell number A000129(m). Also, odd composite integers m such that U(m)^2 == 1 (mod m) and V(m) == 6 (mod m), where U(m)=A001109(m) and V(m)=A003499(m) are the m-th generalized Lucas and Pell-Lucas numbers of parameters a=6 and b=1, respectively.
